title: Query regarding Electronic City Campus
content:
Is there anyone from this subreddit who is from the Electronic City Campus??

I have certain queries regarding this...

comments.body: EC, CSE here, happy to help
Yeah EC CSE here, happy to help.
afaik companies dont even know which campus ur from EC or RR PES is represented as just one college to companies but  both campuses take part tho

Not true, like the other redditor said, the hiring dept wont know which campus you are. Now it comes down to the placement cell, and honestly the placement cell has got better jobs to do rather than segregating RR and EC students. 

The general trend of having better quality students in a larger number in the RR campus gives an illusion that the placement cell has to do something with only giving RR an opportunity, but really its just how you or EC performs. 

If you do well in CP, you have a good resume, a good GPA, the placement cell wont care and will send you forward, regardless of your campus.
This was by far the best explanation of this topic.
